Name: Stela of Es-Ka-shuty
Description: In the rounded lunette of this large stela, two udjat-eyes and two jackals have been placed opposite each other. The remainder of the stela is divided into two mirror image sections by a vertical inscription in one column. The upper scenes show two people offering before Osiris. The lowermost two-thirds of the stela is divided into two sets of seven square panels on each side, each containing a couple with inscription. The entire decorated section is surrounded by text.
